name: HexBuilder – handyworker from another world
description:
As an accurate representation of what could, feasibly, happen to anyone coming back home from a day at the workshop, you are abducted into a tower-defense-ish tabletop game between two Fae nobles vying for supremacy and bragging rights.

Important: We are aware of a few inconsistencies and unexpected behaviors, especially relating to the dialogue. We provided the event team with a bugfix version via email and will make it available here as soon as possible!

Made by Garoa Studios for the Magalu Game Jam 2022.

======================================================
